Sequence Information.Peptide Name: 4K2L (Temporin-1CEc analog, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Ji F, Zhao Y, Jiang F, Shang D. 2022
Literature.Title: Membrane mechanism of temporin-1CEc, an antimicrobial peptide isolated from the skin secretions of Rana chensinensis, and its systemic analogs.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (84.62%) toTemporin-1CEc analog 4KK: 46%, L: 23%, P: 15%.Chemical modification: C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against E. coli (MIC6. 25 uM),  P. aeruginosa (MIC 3.13 uM), E. aerogenes (MIC 3.13 uM), E.cloacae (MIC > 100 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 6.25 uM), S. aureus (MIC 6.25 uM), B.cereus (MIC >100uM), S. lactis (MIC 3.13 uM), E. faecalis (MIC 6.25 uM), E. faecium (MIC3.13 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 50% TFE or 30 mM SDS.In vitro toxicity: Human RBC: HC50 >500 uM, little hemo.lytic.
